meanings.sent1: The radio station will rebroadcast the news at noon.
meanings.sent2: They rebroadcasted the live concert for those who missed it.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally rebroadcasted my embarrassing karaoke performance.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rebroadcasted through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The teacher decided to rebroadcast the lesson to ensure everyone understood.

meanings.sent1: The rebroadcast of the game will be on TV tonight.
meanings.sent2: I missed the live show, but I caught the rebroadcast later.
meanings.sent3: The rebroadcast of the weather forecast made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The rebroadcast of the speech echoed in the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The rebroadcast of the interview clarified some points for the viewers.
